ks_item_data.name: Best Performing Machine
ks_item_data.ks_custom_query:
SELECT machine_name
FROM machine_utilization_report
ORDER BY oee_percent DESC
LIMIT 1

ks_item_data.name: 📌
ks_item_data.ks_custom_query: SELECT '📊 Downtime & Efficiency History – Detailed Analysis' AS result

ks_item_data.name: 📌
ks_item_data.ks_custom_query: SELECT '📊 Quality & Rejections History – Detailed Analysis' AS result

ks_item_data.name: Avg. Rejection % (last 90 days)
ks_item_data.ks_custom_query:
SELECT 
    AVG(rejection_percentage) AS avg_rejection_90
FROM quality_reject_history
WHERE date >= current_date - interval '90 days'

ks_item_data.name: Avg. FPY % (last 90 days)
ks_item_data.ks_custom_query:
SELECT 
    AVG(fpy) AS avg_fpy_90
FROM quality_reject_history
WHERE date >= current_date - interval '90 days'

ks_item_data.name: Highest Defect Week
ks_item_data.ks_custom_query:
SELECT 
    to_char(date, 'Mon YYYY') || ' - W' || to_char(date, 'IW') AS defect_week
FROM quality_reject_history
GROUP BY to_char(date, 'Mon YYYY') || ' - W' || to_char(date, 'IW')
LIMIT 1

ks_item_data.name: Highest Defect Month
ks_item_data.ks_custom_query:
SELECT 
    to_char(date, 'Month YYYY') AS defect_month
FROM quality_reject_history
GROUP BY to_char(date, 'Month YYYY')
LIMIT 1
